channel.title: [317]Project Omega- Perfect skillcape emotes WITH skills and more![317]
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]This is the Project Omega development[/size][/center] [img]http://i33.tinypic.com/2jcgbif.png[/img]
Hello moparscapians :D This is my new server, Project Omega, a HIGHLY edited Richscape V4 source+client. Now let me show you the features!
[center]Features![/center] 100% Barrows with random tunnels! 100% fight pits 100% KQ! fixed herblore a little more to perfection All 24 skills working started on construction, 5% only :P Cooking is 90% because i didnt finish what fish can be cooked :P new Godsword stance! All skillcapes working 100% and gfx works when facing anywhere Fixed the getkiller() method in Czar where you would mage on an npc... bla bla Mage book & Ancients 100% trimmed skillcapes! Friends list bug fixed. All fish are eatable and cookable. Fishing and firemaking fully fixed. Cooking re-done to make it more organized and simple. You can now fill buckets, vials, ect...with water at pumps, wells, fountains, ect... Sound added for: burying bones, eating, smelting, NPC's dying, high alch, low alch, prayer. (Will add tons more) t1 error randomly DCing you when idle fixed. Fixed sound glitch causing NPC deaths to freeze a player. Ice rush fixed. (Thanks mm_naruto) Took out some unnecessary timers. Changed PK timer. Re-added a faster object timer to prevent massclicking. Fixed a PK bug. Sfx added for woodcutting and mining. Cooking is now handled. Sfx added for most specials. Prayer fixed. (Not updating the text) Server is now usable with bluurrs client. Getting stuck in combat fixed.
lots of other things i dont wanna type, but just actually show you it :D oh, and sorry some pics are big :S
[IMG]http://i820.photobucket.com/albums/zz130/waleedtashtoush/WaleedScape/waleed9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i820.photobucket.com/albums/zz130/waleedtashtoush/WaleedScape/waleed8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i820.photobucket.com/albums/zz130/waleedtashtoush/WaleedScape/waleed7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i820.photobucket.com/albums/zz130/waleedtashtoush/WaleedScape/waleed6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i820.photobucket.com/albums/zz130/waleedtashtoush/WaleedScape/waleed5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i820.photobucket.com/albums/zz130/waleedtashtoush/WaleedScape/waleed4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i820.photobucket.com/albums/zz130/waleedtashtoush/WaleedScape/waleed3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i820.photobucket.com/albums/zz130/waleedtashtoush/WaleedScape/waleed2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i820.photobucket.com/albums/zz130/waleedtashtoush/WaleedScape/waleed1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i820.photobucket.com/albums/zz130/waleedtashtoush/WaleedScape/waleed-1.png[/img]
BTW, im ProjectOMEGA2!! i just made a new acc cuz i was warned............

item.title: [317]Project Omega- Perfect skillcape emotes WITH skills and more![317]
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

[center][size=24pt]This is the Project Omega development[/size][/center]

Hello moparscapians
This is my new server, Project Omega, a HIGHLY edited Richscape V4 source+client. Now let me show you the features!

[center]Features![/center]
100% Barrows with random tunnels!
100% fight pits
100% KQ!
fixed herblore a little more to perfection
All 24 skills working
started on construction, 5% only
Cooking is 90% because i didnt finish what fish can be cooked
new Godsword stance!
All skillcapes working 100% and gfx works when facing anywhere
Fixed the getkiller() method in Czar where you would mage on an npc… bla bla
Mage book & Ancients 100%
trimmed skillcapes!
Friends list bug fixed.
All fish are eatable and cookable.
Fishing and firemaking fully fixed.
Cooking re-done to make it more organized and simple.
You can now fill buckets, vials, ect…with water at pumps, wells, fountains, ect…
Sound added for: burying bones, eating, smelting, NPC’s dying, high alch, low alch, prayer. (Will add tons more)
t1 error randomly DCing you when idle fixed.
Fixed sound glitch causing NPC deaths to freeze a player.
Ice rush fixed. (Thanks mm_naruto)
Took out some unnecessary timers.
Changed PK timer.
Re-added a faster object timer to prevent massclicking.
Fixed a PK bug.
Sfx added for woodcutting and mining.
Cooking is now handled.
Sfx added for most specials.
Prayer fixed. (Not updating the text)
Server is now usable with bluurrs client.
Getting stuck in combat fixed.

lots of other things i dont wanna type, but just actually show you it
